Quizicks rules

Time Limit – You have 30 seconds to answer each question. If the timer runs out before you answer, it counts as incorrect.

One Chance Only – The game ends immediately if you get a question wrong. No second chances!

Keep the Streak Alive - Answer every question correctly to progress.

Surprise Reward – If you answer all 50 questions correctly, a special surprise awaits you at the end!

Fair Play – No external help, calculators (unless specified), or searching for answers—test your real knowledge!
